mapper.select: SELECT c.class_id AS classId, f.file_url AS fileUrl, c.user_id AS userId, c.class_title AS classTitle, c.class_price AS classPrice FROM class c LEFT JOIN file f ON c.file_no = f.file_no

SELECT c.class_id AS classId, f.file_url AS fileUrl, c.user_id AS userId, c.class_title AS classTitle, c.class_price AS classPrice FROM class c LEFT JOIN file f ON c.file_no = f.file_no WHERE c.class_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.class_price LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.class_category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.class_level LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%');

SELECT c.class_id AS classId, c.class_title AS title, u.name AS instructor, -- ✅ user 테이블에서 name 가져오기 c.class_price AS price, f.file_url AS fileUrl, c.description AS description, c.class_capsule AS classCapsule, c.class_subtitle AS classSubtitle, c.class_category AS classCategory, c.class_recom AS classRecom, c.class_level AS classLevel, -- ✅ 수강생 수 카운트 (환불 안 한 사람만) (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_payment_history uph WHERE uph.class_id = c.class_id AND uph.refund_status = 'y') AS studentCount FROM class c LEFT JOIN file f ON c.file_no = f.file_no LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id -- ✅ user 테이블과 JOIN WHERE c.class_id = #{id}
